moves.name: Dragon Dance
moves.description: Raises user's Attack and Speed.

moves.name: Air Cutter
moves.description: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Twister
moves.description: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

moves.name: Leaf Blade
moves.description: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Silver Wind
moves.description: May raise all stats of user at once.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.description: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

moves.name: Fury Cutter
moves.description: Power increases each turn.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: Opponent becomes confused, but its Attack is raised two stages.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: Lowers opponent's Accuracy.

moves.name: Snore
moves.description: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.description: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.description: Copies the opponent's last move.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: User receives recoil damage.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.description: Sharply raises user's Attack.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.description: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.description: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

moves.name: Bullet Seed
moves.description: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.description: Effects of the attack vary with the location.

moves.name: Nature Power
moves.description: Uses a certain move based on the current terrain.

moves.name: Facade
moves.description: Power doubles if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.description: May lower opponent's Defense.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.description: Makes it sunny for 5 turns.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.description: Type and power depends on user's IVs.

moves.name: Synthesis
moves.description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: Lowers opponent's Evasiveness.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.description: Power decreases with higher Happiness.

moves.name: Return
moves.description: Power increases with user's Happiness.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

moves.name: Steel Wing
moves.description: May raise user's Defense.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: User is not affected by opponent's move.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

moves.name: Flash
moves.description: Lowers opponent's Accuracy.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: Raises user's Evasiveness.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: Badly poisons opponent.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.description: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Growth
moves.description: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

moves.name: Leech Seed
moves.description: User steals HP from opponent each turn.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.description: User must recharge next turn.

moves.name: Roar
moves.description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: Lowers opponent's Defense.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: May paralyze opponent.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: May cause flinching.

moves.name: Stomp
moves.description: May cause flinching.

moves.name: Fly
moves.description: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

moves.name: Gust
moves.description: Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.
